Posts.Content: Khagen wrote: After my third round of chemotherapy my eyes started twitching. I went to eye doctor who prescribed drops- did not help. The Oncologist seemed perplexed and said it could be side effect of chemo, but seemed like she did not really know or have any answers. Meanwhile, I am 30 days past my last chemotherapy session and my eyes still are twitching almost non stop. It's driving me crazy. Anyone else experience this and have any ideas of remedies? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Eye twitching- side effect of chemotherapy?? Khagen dorthy99

Posts.Content: Khagen wrote: I just finished four cycles- yeah! Wondering how long the fatigue lasts. I feel good but get tired so easily. I am eager to get back to normal activities. Also curious how long until you start seeing some Hair back Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How long does the fatigue last after chemo? Khagen Kicks
